message: Let's be reasonable, Bob.  Take this generous offer and we both walk away happy.
Let's meet in the middle, 55% for me is the lowest I'm willing to go.
The rate is only getting worse for you Bob.  Time to get real.
I'll take a bigger share to offset the inflation loss, still a good deal for you.
This is getting ridiculous, Bob. Every round you lose a significant chunk of your potential earnings.  Agree to a reasonable deal now, or there won't be anything left worth splitting.
